title: Thames Moonlight 10 Mile Walk — Parkinson’s UK Fundraiser
summary: Completed the Thames Moonlight 10 Mile Walk (Ultra Challenge) raising funds for Parkinson’s UK (in memory of grandma Jyotshnabaa). Shared results including time, pace and placement, and a donation link.

title: Attended: Product Evenings LDN — Agentic AI
summary: Attended BrainStation’s Product Evenings LDN on Agentic AI and product strategy; shared notes on agent cycles, goal orientation, data quality, and RAG.

title: Degree Awarded: BEng (Hons) Electronic Engineering (University of Surrey)
summary: Shared milestone of being formally awarded BEng (Hons) Electronic Engineering with Upper Second-Class Honours; reflected on modules and dissertation work on transparent perovskite solar cells.

title: Reflection: Year of Growth and Impact at Vision4ce
summary: Reflection post summarising optimisation, automation pipeline development, reliability/error handling, algorithm implementation and MLOps workflow tools; acknowledged team collaboration and mentorship.
